verblex: 1. To measure a large distance from one end of an object to another. English = (be) long.
2. To take a large amount of time from the beginning of some event to the end of it. English = (be) long, (be) lengthy; last a long time.
nomlex: 1. The distance something measures from one end to the other. English = length.
2. The amount of time that it takes for something to happen. English = duration.
